an5.217:1.1: “Mendicants, there are these five drawbacks of uninspiring conduct.
an5.217:1.4: After examination, sensible people criticize you.
an5.217:1.6: You feel lost when you die.
an5.217:1.7: And when your body breaks up, after death, you’re reborn in a place of loss, a bad place, the underworld, hell.
an5.217:1.8: These are the five drawbacks of uninspiring conduct.
an5.217:2.1: There are these five benefits of inspiring conduct.
an5.217:2.4: After examination, sensible people praise you.
an5.217:2.6: You don’t feel lost when you die.
an5.217:2.7: And when the body breaks up, after death, you’re reborn in a good place, a heavenly realm.
an5.217:2.8: These are the five benefits of inspiring conduct.”
